title: Champ in a nutshell guessing game!
body:
Put a gif or image of a champion's passive and abilities and we (the boards) will try to guess who it is! I'll go first!

Passive: 
https://memegenerator.net/img/images/400x/16455369.jpg

Q:
https://media.giphy.com/media/mnBTwcu2QEzC/source.gif

W: 
http://www.burntx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/channing.gif

E:
http://www.thisiscolossal.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/time-1.gif

R:
http://i.imgur.com/u4xGRPa.gif

Poppy?
"Cheese wheel" Q for Poppy?  Erm ... her Q doesn't roll.
I know, but couldn't think of any champions who even came close to it, thought maybe the color of it reminded him of a cheese wheel.

The champ was malphite. I call his Q the cheese wheel because:

1. The projectile kinda looks like a wheel.

2. You cheese people out of lane by spamming it on them.

gave me a little trouble because i forgot Camille existed, and the only shield passives i could think of were Vi and Malphite, with the only one i could think of with the E was Talon. then i looked through the champion list, saw Camille, and everything just clicked XD
